contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Belgium Municipality |name=Willebroek |picture= |picture-legend= |map=WillebroekLocatie.png |map-legend=Location of Willebroek in the province of Antwerp |arms=Coat of arms of Willebroek.jpg |flag=Flag of Willebroek.svg |region={{BE-REG-FLE}} |community={{BE-NL}} |province={{BE-PROV-AN}} |arrondissement=[[Arrondissement of Mechelen|Mechelen]] |nis=12040 |pyramid-date= |0-19= |20-64= |65= |foreigners= |foreigners-date= |mayor=Marc De Laet (sp.a) |majority=[[sp.a]], [[CD&V]], [[N-VA]] |postal-codes=2830 |telephone-area=03 |web=[http://www.willebroek.be/ www.willebroek.be] |lat_deg=51 |lat_min=04 |lon_deg=04 |lon_min=22 }} '''Willebroek''' (old spelling: ''Willebroeck'') is a [[municipality]] located in the [[Belgium|Belgian]] province of [[Antwerp (province)|Antwerp]]. The municipality comprises the towns of [[Blaasveld]], [[Heindonk]], [[Tisselt]], [[Klein Willebroek]] and Willebroek proper. On January 1, 2006 Willebroek had a total population of 23,044. The total area is 27.41 km² which gives a [[population density]] of 841 inhabitants per km². Willebroek is linked to [[Brussels]] by the [[Brussels-Scheldt Maritime Canal|Willebroek Canal]]. Willebroek is also home to the ''Kanaalfeesten'', a yearly [[festival]] that takes place throughout the town which includes live concerts (mostly of local bands) and general festival attractions, like a mini roller coaster, a duck shoot, etc. ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== *[http://www.willebroek.be Official website] - Available only in [[Dutch language|Dutch]] *[http://www.willebroek.info Local history & dialect website] - Available only in [[Dutch language|Dutch]] {{Municipalities in Antwerp}} [[Category:Municipalities of Antwerp (province)]] {{Antwerp-geo-stub}}
